title: Hand Crossbows
content: Hand Crossbows in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Hand Crossbows are Light Martial Ranged Weapons in BG3 that can be one-handed, dealing 1-6 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 15m, and they deal Piercing Damage, with the exception of the Ne'er Misser that has a damage type of Force instead.
